text: As an engineer, | spend a significant part of my daily work searching through manuals, documentations, contracts, etc, instead of actually doing what | am paid for and enjoy about my job, which is solving problems. Now multiply that by every lawyer, banker and researcher on Earth and we burn $2 trillion in wasted cognition each year, time that could cure cancer. As Al systems become more sophisticated and trustworthy, more and more of the globally available information will be Al-generated, which means more stuff for us humans to read on the other side. In Hermatica, we believe that the only way to navigate this emerging world of infinite information is with tools of equal intelligence that can find everything for you , allowing you to focus on what matters. And that's what we aim to build.
